sentences.en: At a wholesale vegetable market in Beijing, one manager says his costs have soared, as the products need to be transported in cool containers during the hot summer weather.
sentences.cn: 北京一个蔬菜批发市场，一名经理说他的成本已经猛增，因为夏天天气太热，这些产品都要装在冷却箱里进行运输。

sentences.en: Ed sent out Christmas cards wholesale.
sentences.cn: 艾德大量寄送圣诞卡.

sentences.en: He does wholesale business, while his brother is engaged in retail business.
sentences.cn: 他经营批发生意, 他弟弟则经营零售生意.

sentences.en: He is a wholesale merchant.
sentences.cn: 他是个批发商.

sentences.en: His onions cost 9p a lb wholesale; packing and transport costs 10p.
sentences.cn: 他的洋葱批发价每磅9便士；打包送货的话要10便士。

sentences.en: I am in the wholesale trade.
sentences.cn: 我做批发生意。

sentences.en: It was wholesale slaughter of women and children.
sentences.cn: 那是对妇女和儿童的大规模屠杀。

sentences.en: Retailers buy at wholesale.
sentences.cn: 零售商整批买进.

sentences.en: She's in the wholesale fruit trade.
sentences.cn: 她从事水果批发.

sentences.en: Shopkeepers buy wholesale and sell retail.
sentences.cn: 小店主整批买进再零售出去.

sentences.en: Such shoes usually wholesale for much less.
sentences.cn: 这种鞋批发出售通常要便宜得多.

sentences.en: The fabrics are sold wholesale to retailers, fashion houses, and other manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 这些纺织品批发给零售商、时装店和其他厂家。

sentences.en: The fabrics are sold wholesale to retailers, fashion houses, and other manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 这些纺织品被批发给零售商、时装店和其他制造商。

sentences.en: Their business is wholesale only.
sentences.cn: 他们只做批发生意.

sentences.en: They own a wholesale business in clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们经营服装批发生意.

sentences.en: They wholesale the T - shirts at $ 5 each.
sentences.cn: 他们以每件五美元的价格批发出售这些 T 恤衫.

sentences.en: Warehouse clubs allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices.
sentences.cn: 仓储式会员店允许会员以批发价购买商品。

sentences.en: When we buy goods from overseas, we generate some jobs in retail and wholesale.
sentences.cn: 当我们从海外购买物资，这在零售和批发制造了一些工作机会。

sentences.en: wholesale prices
sentences.cn: 批发价

sentences.en: You want to retail or wholesale?
sentences.cn: 你想零售还是批发？

phrases.tran_cn: 对同业及大客户的大金额银行业务

trans.tran_en: relating to the business of selling goods in large quantities at low prices to other businesses, rather than to the general public
If something is sold wholesale, it is sold in large quantities and at cheaper prices, usually to stores
the business of selling goods in large quantities at low prices to other businesses, rather than to the general public
If something is sold wholesale, it is sold in large quantities and at cheaper prices, usually to stores
